description: My place is a very bright and open studio on the Upper East Side. Between 2nd and 3rd Ave. on 83rd St. this apartment is perfect for a couple or two friends looking for a peaceful place to stay. You are near public transportation, the brand new 2nd avenue subway has just opened in 2017 and walking distance from restaurants, bars, shops, movie theaters, The Metropolitan Museum of Art, The Guggenheim, many other museums and Central Park.
name: Upper East Side Sunny Studio
review:
Lina is an excellent hostess and the apartment is beautiful, bright and comfortable. The location is very good: near the metro, restaurants and supermarkets.
Thanks Lina, we hope to be back soon
